p: Interestingly, we found similar results to those obtained for Miami-Dade County residents for weekdays when we analyzed the National Human Activity Patterns (NHAPS) survey data on the U.S. population [ 14]. Specifically, from the U.S. national sample we estimated m = 109 minutes per day (95% CI: 100–157) and shape parameter k = 0.31 (95% CI: 0.29–0.36) ( Fig 2C).
